summary: Replace vocal sounds during fight and breathing to a more younger and brave version...
descriptionHtml:
Brave female voice replacer
  Version>1.02

Hey i made this mod for myself and wanted to share due to some ppl asking for it  --- 


29/05/12 Edit  : Version 1.02 small fix now sound tired on low stamina and more controlled on full stamina.
-Uploaded a version without running breath
------------------------------
Sample 
------------------------------


[youtube]r77-YerTgrs[/youtube] 

Sorry i dont really have time for video editing right no but heres a test and i\'ll be uploading more later...
-----------------------------
Install
-----------------------------
Just drop in Skyrim folder or use NMM. 


-----Description -------------------

Replaces all the vanilla female grunts and groans during fighting and the breathing when running or using the bow on the human races.

The blocking, shouts and other sounds are unaffected.

Due to the generic use of the sound files in skyrim some of the female NPC\'s voices are also replaced. 

You can use this mod as a Wood Elf or High Elf but you need to rename the \"femaleeventoned\" folder to \"femaleelfhaughty\".  


Sorry for my bad english  
I\'m not doing any special requests.

Tell me if you find any bug.
author: Lyss

files.name: Brave female voice no run breath
